title: Gary Oldman officially separated from forth wife Alexandra Edenborough
text:
Other Articles 'Talvar' box office collections: Irrfan Khan starrer records 25% occupancy rate on day 1 'Singh Is Bling' box office collections: Akshay Kumar starrer gathers 80% occupancy on day 1 'Girls Next Door' star Bridget Marquardt engaged to beau Nick Carpenter Gary Oldman and his fourth wife Alexandra Edenborough’s marriage has been called off officially.
According to sources, the 57-year-old actor has been orders to pay 2.2 million dollars to his former wife in divorce settlement, reports E! Online.
Previously, Songwriter Edenborough filed divorce against ‘The Dark Knight’ star ending their six years marriage, citing irreconcilable differences as the reason for the split.
First Published on October 02, 2015 5:10 pm
